Articles.Content:
Hi !

I come with another version of the Dassault aircraft , the Mirage F1 

Model : Parts : Fuel : Mass : Speed Full mass / Unarmed / Low fuel :

Stock : 115 ; 1430 : 18.5 : 850 / 990 / 1100 m/s

BD-A : 84 : 1430 : 21.2 : 650 / 990 / 1100 m/s

I add stock missile on the Type S : Use Stage key .

For Type B :

Stage : Next Weapon

RCS : Fire

Abord : Auto pilot + Combat Mode ( Toggle )

Both flight better with SAS on !

Mirage F1 Type S :[https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1362&authkey=!AM96tLv59EI19MU&ithint=file%2ccraft](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1362&authkey=!AM96tLv59EI19MU&ithint=file%2Ccraft)
